questionsSolved.userSolution:
select concat(first_name," ",last_name) as 'full name'
from patients;

select first_name,last_name,max(height)
from patients;

select count(*)
from admissions;

select distinct(first_name)
from patients
group by first_name
having count(first_name)<2;

select p.patient_id,p.first_name,p.last_name
from patients p
join admissions a on p.patient_id=a.patient_id
where primary_diagnosis='Dementia';

select first_name,last_name,allergies
from patients
where allergies in('Penicillin','Morphine')
order by allergies,first_name,last_name;

select patient_id,primary_diagnosis
from admissions
group by patient_id,primary_diagnosis
having count(patient_id)>1

select city,count(*) as num_patients
from patients
group by city
order by num_patients desc;

select first_name,last_name,'Patient' as role 
from patients p
union 
select first_name,last_name,'Physician'
from physicians

select allergies,count(allergies)
from patients
where allergies not in('NKA','null')
group by allergies
order by count(allergies) desc;

select first_name,last_name,birth_date
from patients
where year(birth_date) between 1970 and 1979
order by birth_date;

select province_id,sum(height)
from patients
group by province_id
having sum(height)>=7000;

select day(admission_date),count(admission_date)
from admissions
group by day(admission_date)
order by count(admission_date) desc;

select patient_id,nursing_unit_id,room,bed
from admissions
where patient_id=542
order by admission_date desc
limit 1;

select nursing_unit_id,count(*)
from admissions
where nursing_unit_id not in('CCU','OR', 'ICU', 'ER')
group by nursing_unit_id;

select patient_id,attending_physician_id,primary_diagnosis
from admissions
where (patient_id % 2!=0 and attending_physician_id in(1,5,19))
or (attending_physician_id like '%2%' and length(patient_id)=3);

select ph.first_name,ph.last_name,count(*)
from physicians ph
join admissions a on a.attending_physician_id=ph.physician_id
group by ph.physician_id;

select ph.physician_id,concat(ph.first_name," ",ph.last_name) as 'full name',MIN(a.admission_date),
		max(a.admission_date)
from admissions a
join physicians ph on a.attending_physician_id=ph.physician_id
group by physician_id

select province_name,count(*)
from patients p 
join provinces pr on p.province_id=pr.province_id
group by province_name 
order by count(*) desc

select
count(*),
floor(weight/10)*10 as w
from patients
group by w order by w desc;

select patient_id,weight,height,
(case when weight/(power(height/100.0,2))>=30 then 1
	else 0 End) as obese
from patients;

SELECT * FROM patients;
--#1
select first_name,last_name,gender
from patients
where gender='M';
--#2
select first_name,last_name
from patients
where allergies is null;
--#3
select first_name
from patients
where first_name like 'C%';
--#4
select first_name,last_name
from patients
where weight between 100 and 120;
--#5
update patients
set allergies='NKA'
where allergies is null;
--#6
select concat(first_name," ",last_name) as 'full name'
from patients;
--#7
select pa.first_name,pa.last_name,p.province_name
from patients pa
join provinces p on p.province_id=pa.province_id;

--#8 select * from patients;
select count(birth_date)
from patients
where year(birth_date)=2010;

--#9
select first_name,last_name,max(height)
from patients;

--#10
select *
from patients
where patient_id in(1,45,534,879,1000);

--#11
select count(*)
from admissions;

--#12
select *
from admissions
where admission_date=discharge_date;

--#13
select patient_id,count(*)
from admissions
where patient_id=573;

--#14
select distinct(city)
from patients
where province_id='NS';

--#15
select first_name,last_name,birth_date
from patients
where height>160 and weight>70;

--#16
select first_name,last_name,allergies
from patients
where allergies not in('NKA','NULL') and city='Hamilton';

--#1  Medium
select distinct(year(birth_date))
from patients
order by birth_date asc;

--#2
select distinct(first_name)
from patients
group by first_name
having count(first_name)<2;

--#3
select patient_id,first_name
from patients
where first_name like 's%____%s';

--#4 select * from admissions;
select p.patient_id,p.first_name,p.last_name
from patients p
join admissions a on p.patient_id=a.patient_id
where primary_diagnosis='Dementia';

--#5
select first_name
from patients
order by length(first_name),first_name;

--#6 select * from patients;
select count(*),(
  	select count(*)
 	 from patients where gender='F')
from patients
where gender='M';

--#7
select first_name,last_name,allergies
from patients
where allergies in('Penicillin','Morphine')
order by allergies,first_name,last_name;

--#8
select patient_id,primary_diagnosis
from admissions
group by patient_id,primary_diagnosis
having count(patient_id)>1

--#9
select city,count(*) as num_patients
from patients
group by city
order by num_patients desc;

--#10
select first_name,last_name,'Patient' as role 
from patients p
union 
select first_name,last_name,'Physician'
from physicians

--#11
select allergies,count(allergies)
from patients
where allergies not in('NKA','null')
group by allergies
order by count(allergies) desc;

--#12
select first_name,last_name,birth_date
from patients
where year(birth_date) between 1970 and 1979
order by birth_date;

--#13
select concat(upper(last_name),",",lower(first_name))
from patients
order by first_name desc;

--#14 select * from patients;
select province_id,sum(height)
from patients
group by province_id
having sum(height)>=7000;

--#15
select (max(weight)-min(weight))
--from patients where last_name='Maroni')
from patients
where last_name='Maroni';

--#16
select day(admission_date),count(admission_date)
from admissions
group by day(admission_date)
order by count(admission_date) desc;

--#17
select patient_id,nursing_unit_id,room,bed
from admissions
where patient_id=542
order by admission_date desc
limit 1;

--#18
select nursing_unit_id,count(*)
from admissions
where nursing_unit_id not in('CCU','OR', 'ICU', 'ER')
group by nursing_unit_id;

--#19
select patient_id,attending_physician_id,primary_diagnosis
from admissions
where (patient_id % 2!=0 and attending_physician_id in(1,5,19))
or (attending_physician_id like '%2%' and length(patient_id)=3);

--#20
select ph.first_name,ph.last_name,count(*)
from physicians ph
join admissions a on a.attending_physician_id=ph.physician_id
group by ph.physician_id;

--#21
select ph.physician_id,concat(ph.first_name," ",ph.last_name) as 'full name',MIN(a.admission_date),
		max(a.admission_date)
from admissions a
join physicians ph on a.attending_physician_id=ph.physician_id
group by physician_id

--#22
select province_name,count(*)
from patients p 
join provinces pr on p.province_id=pr.province_id
group by province_name 
order by count(*) desc

--HARD
--#1
select
count(*),
floor(weight/10)*10 as w
from patients
group by w order by w desc;

--#2
select patient_id,weight,height,
(case
	when weight/(power(height/100.0,2))>=30 then 1
	else 0
End) as obese
from patients;

--#3
